description: Sustainable Participatory Management of Natural Resources to Control Land Degradation in the Thar  Desert Ecosystem

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Promote sustainable and participatory management of natural resources to achieve ecosystem health and integrity, and improve the livelihoods of rural communities in the Thar Desert ecosystems of Rajasthan. The focus is on sustainable management of community land resources, water bodies and livestock.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Management of Natural Resource
